bio: Hello, I’m Sara Lachgar, a software development student passionate about technology and its transformative impact. I build modern and efficient web applications and aim to contribute to innovative projects that drive technological growth.
about_paragraph_1: I am a Software Engineering student pursuing a Professional Bachelor’s degree in Casablanca. I have a strong foundation in front-end and back-end web development and have worked on academic and professional projects using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, React, Laravel, and MySQL.
about_paragraph_2: Motivated, autonomous, and a strong team player, I continuously seek to improve my technical and soft skills. My goal is to take part in innovative projects and deliver reliable, meaningful, and impactful digital solutions.

items.title: Professional Bachelor’s Degree in Software Engineering
Specialized Technician Diploma in Full Stack Development
High School Diploma in Physical Sciences
Final Year Internship – Web Development
items.description: Development of a web-based diploma management system. UML system design, native PHP and MySQL development, Admin dashboard (CRUD, statistics), Recruiter interface, and data security.

items.title: Mini Project – Web Development
items.description: Task management web application with role-based access and interactive dashboard. Technologies: MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js (MERN Stack).

items.title: Internship – Web Development
items.description: Front-end development using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Back-end user and data management with PHP and MySQL. Interactive forms with client- and server-side validation.
